activities: Information received from the EU is explicitly retrieved for the sole purpose of performing background checks on international applicants for primarily domestic clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and customer data are handled daily by our staff and a great portion of this is processed manually.
privacyprograms: As a founding member of the National Association of Professional Background Screeners, we have been at the fore of privacy control measures and our staff are required to successfully complete NAPBS' FCRA Basic Certification.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association's International Centre for Dispute Resolution (AAA/ICDR)
